thread.title: Transport Topics Names Christie Raymond Vice President of Sales
thread.title_full: Transport Topics Names Christie Raymond Vice President of Sales - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Transport Topics Names Christie Raymond Vice President of Sales
text:
American Trucking Associations
ARLINGTON, Va. , Oct. 9, 2015 /PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- Transport Topics , the weekly newspaper of trucking and freight transportation, announced today it has named Christie Raymond to the position of vice president of sales.
"Christie has done remarkable work for TT in her time as a regional sales representative and I have tremendous confidence that she will continue that in her new role," said Jeff Mason , Transport Topics publisher and executive vice president of American Trucking Associations.
" Transport Topics is a special publication, just as trucking is a special industry," Raymond said. "I'm looking forward to this new opportunity to continue serving both."
In her role as vice president, Raymond will oversee Transport Topics print and digital sales efforts .
Prior to joining TT, Raymond spent three years at Condé Nast and all told she has more than two decades of experience in advertising sales and marketing.
Raymond lives in Gainesville, Va. , with her husband and two daughters.
American Trucking Associations is the largest national trade association for the trucking industry. Through a federation of 50 affiliated state trucking associations and industry-related conferences and councils, ATA is the voice of the industry America depends on most to move our nation's freight. Follow ATA on Twitter or on Facebook . Trucking Moves America Forward .
